actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to provide that the individual income tax rate reductions provided by the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981 shall not take effect until the Federal budget is balanced.

summary.text: Requires that the income tax reductions provided by the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981 not take effect until the Federal budget is balanced.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the individual income tax rate reductions provided by the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981 shall not take effect until the Federal budget is balanced.
